short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically expands or collapses all nested records in ArchivesSpace and ExploreUK.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension expands and contracts nested records in ArchivesSpace and ExploreUK. 

For enormous or deeply nested records in ArchivesSpace, you may need to scroll down on the record and tap "Expand All" more than once. But you'll get there!
